Package hr.fer.zemris.java.hw12.jvdraw.actions

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DrawCircleAction
    Action that selects mode for drawing circles in JVDraw program.
    DrawFCircleAction
    Action that selects mode for drawing filled circles in JVDraw program.
    DrawLineAction
    Action that selects mode for drawing lines in JVDraw program.
    ExitAction
    Action that exites the JVDraw program.
    ExportAction
    Action that exports current picture in JVDraw program.
    OpenAction
    Action that opens a .jvd file and presents it in as picture.
    SaveAction
    Action that saves current picture in .jvd format
    SaveAsAction
    Action that saves current picture as in .jvd format
